rules_text:
When this creature enters, target tapped land you control becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature until this creature leaves the battlefield.
Lands you control have “Ward–Sacrifice a land.” [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player sacrifices a land.”.)[/i]
